original: Jehrlander, Per Gösta Hugo, kyrkoherde, Brokind, f. 25/3/97 i Flistad, ösitergöitl. 1. G. 24 m. Elna Lindqvist. Barn: Per-Arne f. 26, Nils-Eric 29, Lennart 31. — Stud :ex. i Linköp. 16, teol. fil. ex. 19, teol. kand., prakt. teo’l. prov samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 23. V. pastor i Björsäter 23, v. kom-min. i V. Eneby 24, kommin. i N. Sol-berga s. å., kyrkoh. i Vårdnäs sed. 32. Ordf. i kyrkostämman, kyrkofullm., folks«k :styr., boställistyr., pens :nd o. bibi: styr.
translated: Jehrlander, Per Gösta Hugo, vicar, Brokind, born on March 25, 1897 in Flistad, Östergötland. Married on May 24 to Elna Lindqvist. Children: Per-Arne born in 1926, Nils-Eric born in 1929, Lennart born in 1931. Education: passed examinations in Linköping in 1916, theological philosophy examination in 1919, practical theological examination and ordained as a priest in Linköping diocese in 1923. Acting pastor in Björsäter in 1923, assistant minister in V. Eneby in 1924, curate in N. Solberga the same year, and vicar in Vårdnäs since 1932. Chairman of the church assembly, church council, people's school committee, parsonage committee, pension committee, and library committee.
